    • Method Detail

      • getAllPossibleVoices

        public Collection<VoiceInfo> getAllPossibleVoices()
        Returns:
        the list of all the voices that can be automatically chosen by the pipeline. It can help TTS adapters to build their list of available voices.

      • findAvailableVoice

        public Voice findAvailableVoice(String voiceEngine,
                                String voiceName,
                                String lang,
                                String gender,
                                boolean[] exactMatch)
        Parameters:
        voiceEngine - is null if unknown
        voiceName - is null if unknown
        lang - is null if unknown
        gender - is null if unknown
        exactMatch[0] - will be set to True if an exact match is found. The argument can be null if the returned information is not required.
        Returns:
        null if no voice is available for the given parameters.

      • findSecondaryVoice

        public Voice findSecondaryVoice(Voice v)

      • getTTS

        public TTSEngine getTTS(Voice voice)
        Parameters:
        voice - is an available voice.
        Returns:
        the best TTS Engine for @param voice. It can return an engine whose OSGi service is no longer enable.
